1261600.name: Creature in the Well Soundtrack + Art Book
1261600.description:
Explore the world of Creature in the Well with a special edition of the soundtrack, featuring nine atmospheric tracks composed by Jim Fowler. For your listening pleasure, all tracks are provided in MP3 and WAV.

Delve even deeper with a 70+ page digital art book, chronicling the creation of Creature in the Well through sketches, concept art and developer commentary by creators Adam Volker and Bohdon Sayre.
